ygData.subject: Re: Banded Armor vs Chainmail
ygData.msgSnippet: Im level 11 and maxed in the skills I need except bash. wich is around 35 instead of 60. (I know I know) I have I think 35 pracs left or so, and I have 5
ygData.messageBody:
Im level 11 and maxed in the skills I need except bash. wich is around 35
instead of 60. (I know I know)

I have I think 35 pracs left or so, and I have 5 banded pices (mask,2
bracers, arms and boots) should I invest my pracs in smithing or is it just
not worth it? What do I have to get my smithing skill to for it to be
profitable. I have read a few guides but its clear that the people writing
them arnt alwasy that objective. hope you can help

Vashi (terror poster)

>From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>
>
>Yes, at the moment, not patterns for anything else.
>
> > ----------
> > From: schlaban yocksovik[SMTP:anonymaste@...]
> > Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > Sent: Tuesday, May 18, 1999 3:24 PM
> > To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Banded Armor vs Chainmail
> >
> > From: "schlaban yocksovik" <anonymaste@...>
> >
> >
> > First piece you should get are the bracers. Price should be 5pp.
> > Anything else is a rippoff or a good deal.
> > The other pices range from 12pp to 8pp
> > Tunics and cloaks? It hink are the most expensive parts.
> >
> >
> > Oh I got a question.....Is banded the best armor a smith can make?
> >
> > Vashi
> >
> >
> > >From: suzkim@...
> > >
> > >Greetins,
> > >
> > >Been told banded just as good as chainmail but cheaper. True? If so
>know
> > >of anyone in Halas selling it on Veeshan server?
> > >*thinks*
> > >what would be the average cost for large?
> > >what would be the first piece I should get?
> > >
> > >Azlana, warrior of Veeshan
